org.safs.selenium

    • Field Detail

      • Runner

        public static EmbeddedHookDriverRunner Runner
        The Runner object providing access to the underlying Selenium Engine. This is the main object subclasses would use to execute SeleniumPlus actions and commands and to gain references to more complex services like the running JSAFSDriver or the Selenium WebDriver object(s).

    • Constructor Detail

      • SeleniumPlus

        public SeleniumPlus()
        Required Default no-arg constructor. Any subclass instantiation should also invoke this super();

    • Method Detail

      • StartTestCase

        public static boolean StartTestCase(java.lang.String tcname)
        Start capturing test activity counts for a specific application feature or testcase.
        Parameters:
        tcname - The name of the testcase to start using a Counter on.
        Returns:
        false only if a failure of some kind was reported in attempting to start the counter.
        See Also:
        StopTestCase(String), PrintTestCaseSummary(String)

      • StopTestCase

        public static boolean StopTestCase(java.lang.String tcname)
        Stop capturing test activity counts for a specific application feature or testcase.
        Parameters:
        tcname - The name of the testcase to stop. The name must match a counter that was previously started.
        Returns:
        false only if a failure of some kind was reported in attempting to stop the counter.
        See Also:
        StartTestCase(String), PrintTestCaseSummary(String)

      • PrintTestCaseSummary

        public static boolean PrintTestCaseSummary(java.lang.String tcname)
        Stop capturing test activity counts for a specific application feature or testcase if it is still active, then print a summary report of all tests counted, passed, failed, and skipped, etc...
        Parameters:
        tcname - The name of the testcase to start using a Counter on. The name must match a counter that was previously started.
        Returns:
        false only if a failure of some kind was reported in attempting to stop the counter or print the summary report into the log.
        See Also:
        StartTestCase(String), StopTestCase(String)

      • runTest

        public abstract void runTest()
                      throws java.lang.Throwable
        Start writing tests in this required method in your subclass. This must be an "instance" method because subclasses cannot Override static superclass methods.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • AbortTest

        public static void AbortTest(java.lang.String reason)
                      throws java.lang.Throwable
        Prints a detailed abort message to the log and throws a RuntimeException to abort the test run.
        Parameters:
        reason - will be prepended to the detailed abort information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main inherited by subclasses is required. Subclasses should not override this main method.

        Any subclass specific initialization should be done in the default no-arg constructor for the subclass. That Constructor will be instantiated and invoked automatically by this main startup method.

        Parameters:
        args -
